name: RennacTalkEphraim
_source: speak;Rennac;Huh?|...You're a man.|Sorry, pal, but I'm not interested in men.
speak;Ephraim;What are you doing here in the castle?|You seem to be weighed down a bit.|Helping yourself to the treasure?
speak;Rennac;Ha!|I've no idea what you're talking about.|Now, wait a minute...|You couldn't be...|Aren't you Prince Ephraim?!?
speak;Rennac;I-I thought so.|You're the one they call the Beast of Renais...|I've heard tales of how you've looted and pillaged your way across the land...
speak;Rennac;H-Hold on!|Calm down!|You won't get any treasure by killing me.|If you want these goods, it'll cost you.|10,000 gold.
speak;Rennac;Yeah...|Is that too high?|Fine, then you get my sword as well.|I'll join your army.|So that's me and the treasure for only 9,980 gold!|What do you say?
speak;Ephraim;You know, I have no idea how I got pulled into this conversation.|9,980 gold, eh?|I haven't decided yet...
speak;Larachel;Aha!|So this is where you've wandered off to, Rennac!
speak;Rennac;Wait...|Hold on now.|Go with you where?|Look, I'm sorry, but I've been hired by the Grado Empire, and...|Hello!|I'm talking to you!
speak;Larachel;Rennac, whatever is the matter?|I promise to listen to your story later, but now, we must be going!

speak;Rennac;No, I'm no servant, like that kook Dozla.|I'm a mercenary.|I escorted you to Renais like I was hired to do, didn't I?|You have no right to drag me across creation without any pay whatsoever!
speak;Larachel;Is this about wages?|I believe you've received ample compensation.

speak;Rennac;Ample?!|Do you even know what that word means?|You're the princess of Rausten!|I thought working for you would pay well!|Yet your purse strings are knotted tight, and I've almost been killed so many-
speak;Larachel;The joy that comes from doing good is not something that can be purchased.|There.|All better?|Let's go.
speak;Rennac;NO!|I said I don't want to!|Riding about with you is-|...And there she goes.|Oh... By the Stones, why did I ever take that job in the first place?
speak;Rennac;Right, right.|I'm coming...|Now should I use my <red>Sword</>, <red>Dark</> magic, or some <red>Anima</> magic?
